segments.content: This week, I've been looking at the release of Lit 3.0 to see if the use of Web Components has become easier with React.
segments.sourceMdx: This week, I've been looking at the release of Lit 3.0 to see if the use of Web Components has become easier with React.
segments.translated_content: 本周我关注了Lit 3.0的发布，想看看在React中使用Web Components是否变得更简单了。

segments.content: On the React-Native side, version 0.73 is in release candidate with a number of DX improvements. There's also interesting activity regarding the possible optimisation of the Text and View components. Canvaskit-js makes it possible to run Skia on the web for just 20kb!
segments.sourceMdx: On the React-Native side, version 0.73 is in release candidate with a number of DX improvements. There's also interesting activity regarding the possible optimisation of the Text and View components. Canvaskit-js makes it possible to run Skia on the web for just 20kb!
segments.translated_content: 在React-Native方面，0.73版本已进入发布候选阶段，带来多项开发者体验改进。关于Text和View组件可能的优化也有有趣进展。Canvaskit-js实现了仅20kb就能在Web端运行Skia！

segments.content: There were some interesting announcements at ViteConf last week. Notably a Rust port of Rollup, and the usage of Vite with Remix and React-Native.
segments.sourceMdx: There were some interesting announcements at ViteConf last week. Notably a Rust port of Rollup, and the usage of Vite with Remix and React-Native.
segments.translated_content: 上周ViteConf上有一些值得关注的公告，特别是Rollup的Rust移植版本，以及Vite在Remix和React-Native中的应用。

segments.content: [**highlight.io**](http://highlight.io) is a truly open-source application monitoring solution. They support Session Replay, Error Monitoring, and Logging platform; a perfect solution for your next project.
segments.sourceMdx: [**highlight.io**](http://highlight.io) is a truly open-source application monitoring solution. They support Session Replay, Error Monitoring, and Logging platform; a perfect solution for your next project.
segments.translated_content: [**highlight.io**](http://highlight.io) 是真正的开源应用监控解决方案，支持会话回放、错误监控和日志平台，是您下一个项目的完美选择。

segments.content: Don't waste time trying to guess why a bug happens. Use highlight and get a clear picture of your browser and server-side application.
segments.sourceMdx: Don't waste time trying to guess why a bug happens. Use highlight and get a clear picture of your browser and server-side application.
segments.translated_content: 无需浪费时间猜测bug成因。使用highlight即可清晰掌握浏览器端和服务器端应用状态。

segments.content: It is super easy to install in your favorite framework: [React.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/client-sdk/reactjs) [Next.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/next-js) [Remix](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/remix), or anything else!
segments.sourceMdx: It is super easy to install in your favorite framework: [React.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/client-sdk/reactjs) [Next.js,](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/next-js) [Remix](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/remix), or anything else!
segments.translated_content: 支持主流框架快速集成：[React.js](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/client-sdk/reactjs)、[Next.js](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/next-js)、[Remix](https://www.highlight.io/docs/getting-started/fullstack-frameworks/remix)及其他技术栈！

segments.content: Google's Web Components framework [Lit has just been released in v3.0](https://lit.dev/blog/2023-10-10-lit-3.0/). In addition to improvements to the framework (decorators, template compiler, Preact Signals), there is in particular the `@lit/react` integration package, which has graduated from the Lab, is now stable and in v1.0.
segments.sourceMdx: Google's Web Components framework [Lit has just been released in v3.0](https://lit.dev/blog/2023-10-10-lit-3.0/). In addition to improvements to the framework (decorators, template compiler, Preact Signals), there is in particular the `@lit/react` integration package, which has graduated from the Lab, is now stable and in v1.0.
segments.translated_content: 谷歌的Web Components框架[Lit刚发布3.0版本](https://lit.dev/blog/2023-10-10-lit-3.0/)。除了框架本身的改进（装饰器、模板编译器、Preact Signals），特别值得注意的是`@lit/react`集成包已结束实验阶段，现推出稳定版v1.0。

segments.content: This integration facilitates the use of Web Components in a React app (or Preact) by creating a wrapper that maps React props to the properties of the custom element, manages event handlers and facilitates TypeScript typing. It fills certain gaps in React 18, which does not integrate easily with Web Components: props are mapped to attributes rather than properties. See the [documentation for the React framework](https://lit.dev/docs/frameworks/react/).
segments.sourceMdx: This integration facilitates the use of Web Components in a React app (or Preact) by creating a wrapper that maps React props to the properties of the custom element, manages event handlers and facilitates TypeScript typing. It fills certain gaps in React 18, which does not integrate easily with Web Components: props are mapped to attributes rather than properties. See the [documentation for the React framework](https://lit.dev/docs/frameworks/react/).
segments.translated_content: 该集成方案通过创建包装器将React props映射到自定义元素的属性，管理事件处理并优化TypeScript类型支持，极大简化了Web Components在React（或Preact）应用中的使用。这弥补了React 18与Web Components集成时的某些不足——React默认将props映射为属性而非特性。详见[React框架集成文档](https://lit.dev/docs/frameworks/react/)。

segments.content: But can a modern React dev use all this easily? Lit offers experimental packages [@lit-labs/ssr](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr), [@lit-labs/ssr-react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr-react) and [@lit-labs/nextjs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/nextjs) but support is limited and won't work with Next.js App Router. The [Declarative Shadow DOM](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/declarative-shadow-dom/), which allows SSR, is not yet implemented in Firefox, but a polyfill exists. In short, Lit should work well on a CRA app, but still feels a bit risky if you need SSR and SEO.
segments.sourceMdx: But can a modern React dev use all this easily? Lit offers experimental packages [@lit-labs/ssr](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr), [@lit-labs/ssr-react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr-react) and [@lit-labs/nextjs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/nextjs) but support is limited and won't work with Next.js App Router. The [Declarative Shadow DOM](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/declarative-shadow-dom/), which allows SSR, is not yet implemented in Firefox, but a polyfill exists. In short, Lit should work well on a CRA app, but still feels a bit risky if you need SSR and SEO.
segments.translated_content: 但现代React开发者能轻松使用这些功能吗？Lit提供的实验性包[@lit-labs/ssr](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr)、[@lit-labs/ssr-react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/ssr-react)和[@lit-labs/nextjs](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@lit-labs/nextjs)支持有限，无法与Next.js App Router兼容。[声明式Shadow DOM](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/declarative-shadow-dom/)（实现SSR的关键）尚未在Firefox中实现，但已有polyfill方案。简而言之，Lit在CRA应用中表现良好，但在需要SSR和SEO的场景下仍存在一定风险。

segments.content:
* 💸 [Create collaborative applications like Figma and Miro in a few lines of code with Ably's in-app collaboration SDK](https://hubs.la/Q023nqgg0)
* 👀 [Remix PR - Add experimental Vite support](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/7590)
* 👀 [Remix PR - Add startViewTransition support](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/pull/10916)
* 👀 [Next.js PR - Document Server Actions `.bind` method](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/56164): the [Next.js doc](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/functions/server-actions#binding-arguments) now recommends using `myAction.bind(null, myArg)` to pass additional arguments to a Server Action. The returned function will then also be a Server Action.
* 📜 [UI Composition - AKA taking a step back to take a step forward](https://kyleshevlin.com/ui-composition): article presenting an example of a Card component that has too much responsibility. Suggests splitting it and using composition to make it more maintainable.
* 📜 [Server-side pagination with Remix](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-pagination): I found this implementation very interesting, with no `onClick` listener or JS to manipulate the query string. It relies solely on the native behaviour of forms and is therefore compatible with progressive enhancement. My reservation: impossible to open a page in a new tab 😅.
* 📜 [Access the Loader Data in Remix](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/access-loaders-data-in-remix): presents different ways of using `useLoaderData` or `useRouteLoaderData` and their tradeoffs, depending on where they are used.
* 📜 [Why I love Remix, And why you should too](https://alemtuzlak.hashnode.dev/why-i-love-remix)
* 📜 [Making React Apps Memory Efficient - Million.js Beyond Speed](https://dev.to/ricardonunezio/millionjs-beyond-speed-making-react-apps-memory-efficient-2amn)
* 📜 [Test your React Libraries Locally with Yalc](https://www.propelauth.com/post/test-your-react-libraries-with-yalc)
* 📜 [Why we still use React HOCs](https://www.propelauth.com/post/why-we-have-both-react-hooks-and-hocs)
* 📜 [Progressively Enhanced WebGL Lens Refraction](https://tympanus.net/codrops/2023/10/10/progressively-enhanced-webgl-lens-refraction/)
* 📦 [Fresh v1.5 - Partials, client side navigation and more](https://deno.com/blog/fresh-1.5): the Preact framework implements client-side navigation based on "Partials", which permits to preserve some state during navigation. View Transitions support is on the way.
* 📦 [next-safe-action v4 - Typesafe Server Actions in your Next.js 13 app](https://next-safe-action.dev/): input validation with Zod. Note: a similar project [Zact](https://github.com/pingdotgg/zact) is deprecated in favour of `next-safe-action`.
* 📦 [Astro Starlight v0.11](https://github.com/withastro/starlight/releases/tag/%40astrojs%2Fstarlight%400.11.0): adds support for [component overrides](https://starlight.astro.build/guides/overriding-components/) to customize docs.
* 📦 [React-Query 5.0.0 RC.10](https://github.com/TanStack/query/releases/tag/v5.0.0-rc.10): the latest RCs bring significant improvements to [🐦 devtools](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1711297673934848388) and [🐦 TypeScript](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1711635656642855297).
* 🔗 [ServerComponents.dev](https://servercomponents.dev/): a fun interactive resource to find out more about Server Components.
* 🎥 [What's new in Remotion – September 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ol-571DOPDY)
* 📅 [React Jam - October 19-29th - React devs create and play games in 10 days](https://reactjam.com/)
* 👥 [React Advanced](https://reactadvanced.com/?utm_source=email\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) (London 🇬🇧, Octobre 20-23) is offering us [-10% - code "REACT10"](https://ti.to/gitnation/react-advanced-london-2023/discount/REACT10)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [用Ably的应用内协作SDK只需几行代码就能创建类似Figma和Miro的协作应用](https://hubs.la/Q023nqgg0)
- 👀 [Remix PR - 新增实验性Vite支持](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/pull/7590)
- 👀 [Remix PR - 新增startViewTransition支持](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/pull/10916)
- 👀 [Next.js PR - 文档说明Server Actions的`.bind`方法](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/56164): [Next.js文档](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/functions/server-actions#binding-arguments)现在推荐使用`myAction.bind(null, myArg)`向Server Action传递额外参数，返回的函数也将是一个Server Action。
- 📜 [UI组合——退一步海阔天空](https://kyleshevlin.com/ui-composition): 文章通过一个承担过多职责的Card组件案例，建议通过拆分和组合提升可维护性。
- 📜 [Remix实现服务端分页](https://www.jacobparis.com/content/remix-pagination): 这种完全不依赖`onClick`监听器或JS操作查询字符串的实现很有趣，仅依靠表单原生行为即可兼容渐进增强。唯一不足：无法在新标签页打开页面😅。
- 📜 [在Remix中访问Loader数据](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/access-loaders-data-in-remix): 分析不同场景下使用`useLoaderData`或`useRouteLoaderData`的取舍。
- 📜 [我为什么热爱Remix，你也应该试试](https://alemtuzlak.hashnode.dev/why-i-love-remix)
- 📜 [提升React应用内存效率——Million.js不止于速度](https://dev.to/ricardonunezio/millionjs-beyond-speed-making-react-apps-memory-efficient-2amn)
- 📜 [使用Yalc本地测试React库](https://www.propelauth.com/post/test-your-react-libraries-with-yalc)
- 📜 [为什么我们仍在React中使用高阶组件](https://www.propelauth.com/post/why-we-have-both-react-hooks-and-hocs)
- 📜 [渐进增强的WebGL镜头折射效果](https://tympanus.net/codrops/2023/10/10/progressively-enhanced-webgl-lens-refraction/)
- 📦 [Fresh v1.5 - 局部更新、客户端导航等新特性](https://deno.com/blog/fresh-1.5): 这个Preact框架通过"局部"更新实现客户端导航状态保持，视图过渡功能即将推出。
- 📦 [next-safe-action v4 - Next.js 13的类型安全Server Actions](https://next-safe-action.dev/): 集成Zod输入验证。注：类似项目[Zact](https://github.com/pingdotgg/zact)已弃用并推荐使用本库。
- 📦 [Astro Starlight v0.11](https://github.com/withastro/starlight/releases/tag/%40astrojs%2Fstarlight%400.11.0): 新增[组件覆写功能](https://starlight.astro.build/guides/overriding-components/)自定义文档。
- 📦 [React-Query 5.0.0 RC.10](https://github.com/TanStack/query/releases/tag/v5.0.0-rc.10): 最新候选版显著优化了[🐦开发者工具](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1711297673934848388)和[🐦TypeScript支持](https://twitter.com/TkDodo/status/1711635656642855297)。
- 🔗 [ServerComponents.dev](https://servercomponents.dev/): 了解Server Components的趣味交互式资源。
- 🎥 [Remotion新特性——2023年9月](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ol-571DOPDY)
- 📅 [React Jam - 10月19-29日 - 用10天开发游戏的React开发者盛会](https://reactjam.com/)
- 👥 [React Advanced大会](https://reactadvanced.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=thisweekinreact)(伦敦🇬🇧 10月20-23日)提供[9折优惠码"REACT10"](https://ti.to/gitnation/react-advanced-london-2023/discount/REACT10)

segments.content: Clerk is the easiest way to add authentication and user management to your React app. It’s purpose-built for the modern web and designed to get you up and running in minutes.
segments.sourceMdx: Clerk is the easiest way to add authentication and user management to your React app. It’s purpose-built for the modern web and designed to get you up and running in minutes.
segments.translated_content: Clerk是为现代Web应用量身打造的身份验证与用户管理解决方案，只需几分钟即可快速集成到React项目中。

segments.content: [**Using RCTView & RCTText in React Native for Performance Gains**](https://blog.theodo.com/2023/10/native-views-rn-performance/)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Using RCTView & RCTText in React Native for Performance Gains**](https://blog.theodo.com/2023/10/native-views-rn-performance/)

segments.content: At the moment, React-Native devs are talking a lot [on Twitter](https://twitter.com/FernandoTheRojo/status/1707762822015267219) about the perf of the `Text` and `View` components, which are JS wrappers and add overhead compared to the respective native `RCTText` and `RCTView` elements. William Candillon had already 🎥 [explained this problem](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1D78Tc46Xqo\&t=1156s) in 2021, with the possibility of optimising Text rendering. It is possible to optimize as long as you don't need a few features like `onPress` listeners. This article presents a benchmark and measures the impact of using the native components instead of regular components, and reports a gain of around 15%, with variations depending on the platform and architecture.
segments.sourceMdx: At the moment, React-Native devs are talking a lot [on Twitter](https://twitter.com/FernandoTheRojo/status/1707762822015267219) about the perf of the `Text` and `View` components, which are JS wrappers and add overhead compared to the respective native `RCTText` and `RCTView` elements. William Candillon had already 🎥 [explained this problem](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1D78Tc46Xqo&t=1156s) in 2021, with the possibility of optimising Text rendering. It is possible to optimize as long as you don't need a few features like `onPress` listeners. This article presents a benchmark and measures the impact of using the native components instead of regular components, and reports a gain of around 15%, with variations depending on the platform and architecture.
segments.translated_content: 近期React-Native开发者们正在[Twitter上热议](https://twitter.com/FernandoTheRojo/status/1707762822015267219)关于`Text`和`View`组件的性能问题——这些JS封装层相比原生`RCTText`和`RCTView`会带来额外开销。William Candillon早在2021年就通过🎥[视频讲解过此问题](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1D78Tc46Xqo&t=1156s)，并提出在不需要`onPress`等交互功能时优化文本渲染的可能性。本文通过基准测试量化了使用原生组件替代常规组件的性能提升，数据显示平均可获得约15%的性能增益，具体效果因平台和架构而异。

segments.content: Now that this trick became mainstream, React-Native devs are keen to take advantage of it. We can note the creation of [react-native-fast-text](https://github.com/peterpme/react-native-fast-text), or the POC of a Babel plugin [react-native-optimizer](https://github.com/marklawlor/react-native-optimizer) which would apply this optimisation automatically.
segments.sourceMdx: Now that this trick became mainstream, React-Native devs are keen to take advantage of it. We can note the creation of [react-native-fast-text](https://github.com/peterpme/react-native-fast-text), or the POC of a Babel plugin [react-native-optimizer](https://github.com/marklawlor/react-native-optimizer) which would apply this optimisation automatically.
segments.translated_content: 随着该优化技巧的普及，社区迅速涌现了[react-native-fast-text](https://github.com/peterpme/react-native-fast-text)等解决方案，以及能自动应用此优化的Babel插件概念验证[react-native-optimizer](https://github.com/marklawlor/react-native-optimizer)。

segments.content:
* 💸 [Blitz - Build React Native Apps Faster for iOS, Android, and Web!](https://www.blitz-rn.com/)
* 🐦 [Expo docs updates - Bun, local dev, iOS capabilities...](https://twitter.com/amanhimself/status/1710254359274037263)
* 📜 [How to measure React Native performance with Flashlight](https://www.bam.tech/article/measuring-react-native-performance-with-flashlight): shows an example of using Flashlight to compare the scrolling performance of FlatList and Flashlist on Android. You can use ADB or Maestro commands to simulate scrolling.
* 📜 [Remote controls for React TV apps: a declarative approach with react-tv-space-navigation 1.0!](https://www.bam.tech/article/handling-remote-controls-in-tv-apps-the-react-way-with-react-tv-space-navigation-1-0): details leading to the creation of [react-tv-space-navigation](https://github.com/bamlab/react-tv-space-navigation), a cross-platform, agnostic spatial navigation solution that works on React TV apps, both web-based and native.
* 📦 [React-Native v0.73 RC.2](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.73.0-rc.2): v0.73 has just been released in RC. You'll have to check out the [🎥 Keynote at React-Native-EU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-rCRgbsJumk) to see all the highlights. These include one-click debug flow and stable symlinks support!
* 📦 [vxrn - The magic of Vite, meet React Native](https://vxrn.dev/): new experimental project wants to use Vite for cross-platform React-Native development, contrary to Expo, betting on Metro.
* 📦 [Vision-Camera 3.3 - QR-code/Barcode scanner](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-vision-camera/releases/tag/v3.3.0)
* 📦 [Vision-Camera-Barcode-Scanner](https://github.com/mgcrea/vision-camera-barcode-scanner)
* 📦 [Create-Expo-Stack CLI v2](https://expostack.dev/)
* 🎥 [Back to the Web](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3p3NI1yIgcM): William Candillon unveils an experimental polyfill for Skia `canvaskit-js` that lets you run React-Native-Skia on the web in just 20kb, instead of 3mb! Flutter demos already run pretty well with it. You can use it in a Create-React-App without depending on React-Native-Web.
* 🎥 [What’s the Best React Native Storage Option?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wVNPmxntwKQ)
* 🎙️ [React-Native-Radio 277 - Expo Launch Party](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-277-expo-launch-party)
* 🎙 [The React Native Show Podcast 28 - Improving Developer Experience with Expo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4PPDAvgfLHk)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [Blitz - 加速构建 iOS、Android 和 Web 端的 React Native 应用！](https://www.blitz-rn.com/)
- 🐦 [Expo 文档更新 - Bun、本地开发、iOS 功能支持...](https://twitter.com/amanhimself/status/1710254359274037263)
- 📜 [如何使用 Flashlight 测量 React Native 性能](https://www.bam.tech/article/measuring-react-native-performance-with-flashlight)：展示如何利用 Flashlight 对比 Android 平台上 FlatList 与 Flashlist 的滚动性能，可通过 ADB 或 Maestro 命令模拟滚动操作。
- 📜 [React TV 应用的遥控器交互：基于 react-tv-space-navigation 1.0 的声明式方案！](https://www.bam.tech/article/handling-remote-controls-in-tv-apps-the-react-way-with-react-tv-space-navigation-1-0)：详解跨平台空间导航库 [react-tv-space-navigation](https://github.com/bamlab/react-tv-space-navigation) 的开发背景，该方案兼容 Web 和原生环境的 React TV 应用。
- 📦 [React-Native v0.73 RC.2 发布](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.73.0-rc.2)：v0.73 候选版已推出，可通过 [React-Native-EU 主题演讲](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-rCRgbsJumk) 了解一键调试流程和稳定符号链接支持等亮点功能。
- 📦 [vxrn - 融合 Vite 与 React Native 的魔法](https://vxrn.dev/)：这个实验性项目尝试用 Vite 替代 Metro 实现跨平台 React Native 开发。
- 📦 [Vision-Camera 3.3 - 二维码/条形码扫描功能](https://github.com/mrousavy/react-native-vision-camera/releases/tag/v3.3.0)
- 📦 [Vision-Camera-Barcode-Scanner 扫描器插件](https://github.com/mgcrea/vision-camera-barcode-scanner)
- 📦 [Create-Expo-Stack CLI v2 发布](https://expostack.dev/)
- 🎥 [回归 Web 端](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3p3NI1yIgcM)：William Candillon 展示仅 20kb 的 Skia canvaskit-js 实验性 polyfill，使 React-Native-Skia 能脱离 React-Native-Web 在普通 CRA 项目中运行，Flutter 演示效果流畅。
- 🎥 [React Native 最佳存储方案是什么？](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wVNPmxntwKQ)
- 🎙️ [React-Native-Radio 第277期 - Expo 发布派对](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-277-expo-launch-party)
- 🎙 [The React Native Show 第28期 - 用 Expo 提升开发体验](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4PPDAvgfLHk)
